thread.section_title: Hotel Mademoiselle - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent in every way
thread.title_full: Excellent in every way - Review of Hotel Mademoiselle, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: grannywalescc
title: Excellent in every way
text: This is a lovely hotel. It is fun as well as being convenient, comfortable and quiet as well as having excellent levels of service. It seems to absorb its guests so that it's a shock at breakfast to realise how many people are there! Speaking of which the breakfast is splendid with lots of choice and fresh ingredients. An ideal place from which to explore Paris being close to the Gare du Nord but off the main thoroughfares.
